name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Chinese student found several books about ancient China in a British library. In response, many netizens accused the West of plagiarizing Chinese technology and said that without the Yongle Encyclopedia, there would be no Renaissance, gravity, and steam engines in the West. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888257777526874112/pu/img/n3UswWhwt1ANXNId.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7 (Released) Anhui. A pair of siblings said in front of the camera: their father was stabbed by a mentally ill person and was in critical condition. The other party has not come forward to compensate them. Since they come from a rural family and are poor, they cannot afford the huge medical expenses. They beg the relevant departments and leaders to pay attention. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888264440749133825/pu/img/z7jXCHcseENAZSv8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Yichang, Hubei, the Kuomintang emblem on the entrance gate of Shipai Village was removed.
Public information shows that the Shipai Anti-Japanese War Site is located in Shipai Village, Sanduping Town, Yichang City, 17 kilometers away from the city. Shipai is named because of the huge rock on its peak that stands like a sign. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjR6_IVbEAA5lXZ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, Chen Xiaopeng, former Party Secretary and Director of the Shenzhen Securities Regulatory Bureau, was expelled from the Party: He seriously damaged the image of securities supervision and seriously polluted the ecology of the capital market..... https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjSad7zbwAAHZX7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contribution from a student of Chenzhou No. 2 Middle School
The "arms race" of study time has become the norm in Chenzhou, a fourth-tier city. I woke up at 6 a.m., went out to face the cold wind close to 0 degrees Celsius, caught the first bus, sat in my seat and closed my eyes to make up for the lack of sleep. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 8, Jiangsu. At the dinner table, the father said that Japan was good, and was accused by his daughter: "You are Chinese, you should always remember the heinous crimes committed by the Japanese in China"
The father replied: "That's it, our car is still a Japanese car, and there are Japanese parts in your phone"
The daughter said, then smash it, why don't you buy a domestic Hongqi car? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888456046043336704/pu/img/x8Y5kKrTvtIdfi49.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 8 (Release) Traffic police fined a driver at a highway service station, but when he drove away, he was not wearing a seat belt.
February 8, Hebei. Traffic police issued a ticket and drove away without wearing a seat belt. (The video has been deleted)
February 8, Anhui. Netizens filmed the urban management law enforcement vehicle running a red light. (The video has been deleted) https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888510082310389760/pu/img/e1ZdfS3appxrFXN-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Paper: Kindergarten principal sells alcohol on livestream to save herself after 20 million yuan in debt
Amid the "kindergarten closure wave", 8 of the 12 kindergartens of an education group in Guiyang have closed. Founder Jing Yazhen said that the huge debt owed by the company has made "being harassed" a daily routine. In order to maintain operations, she tried to "save herself" by selling alcohol on livestream. https://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1888512406361632768/img/jYxJnuXHWq7i1Az8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Positive energy blogger" Mao Xinghuo wrote about the "Shanxi Urban Management picking locks and turning on lights" incident: "Is it so difficult for businesses to cooperate and turn on lights during the Chinese New Year? It's just picking locks and turning on lights, but it's like robbery and arson. Western selfish individualistic bad values are corroding our society, and this is also the result of cultural invasion" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjVaZhaboAA23bL.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 9 (Release) Frontline medical workers reported the poor quality of the centralized procurement indwelling needles on social media platforms.
A medical worker complained that the needle bent and pierced her hand when adding medicine. "The most annoying thing is that the gastric tube was broken." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjVdfWjbwAAB3Ii.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fuchun School, the second middle school in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, started school early on February 7. After students and parents complained, the school changed the start time. Afterwards, some parents criticized the students who complained in the group: "I hope the kid who complained will not be admitted to any university" and "Who complained with a donkey in the head? Isn't it better to let the child go to school earlier to concentrate, so that he doesn't have to play with his phone at home all day?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888528831096721408/pu/img/ozHirmQAZFSzuYD8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Zibo, Shandong. A female barbecue stall owner did not let her 6-year-old daughter wear clothes, and made her stand naked in the sub-zero temperature outdoors for nearly an hour. In the video, the father asked his daughter to put on clothes, but the female stall owner refused: "Did I tell you to wear clothes? Then you two can go over, I'm leaving" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888533617464463360/pu/img/CvURK_MeEIKE04VX.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 5, a Russian blogger from St. Petersburg wore a T-shirt with the words "Buchha Massacre, let's do it again" written on it.
During the Bucha Campaign during the 2022 invasion of Ukraine, Russia committed a massacre of civilians in Bucha, Kyiv Oblast, Ukraine, which it occupied. Evidence shows that the victims were Ukrainian civilians, not combatants. The victims were almost always tied up with ropes and sealed with tape before being tortured and shot in an execution-style manner. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjVvx-IacAAxO2N.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 8, the public account "First Philosopher" said: There are more than 100 million people suffering from depression in China.
According to WHO data, more than 350 million people suffer from depression worldwide. Professor Huang Yueqin of Peking University Sixth Hospital and others published a research survey report in The Lancet showing that more than 95 million Chinese have suffered from depression in their lifetime.
Among them, the prevalence of depression in Chinese women is significantly higher than that in men, the prevalence is highest in people aged 50-64, and the prevalence in rural people is higher than that in urban people. In 2020, the People's Daily reported that the detection rate of depression in adolescents was 24.6%. Academician Lu Lin of the Chinese Academy of Sciences: In the three years of the epidemic, there are 70 million new patients with depression and 90 million new patients with anxiety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 9, a blogger posted a message saying that if a restaurant posted a notice saying that it had caught 300 rats, killed 3,000 cockroaches, and 5,000 flies, would you still go to such a restaurant to eat?
This Weibo post was subsequently deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjV3RV7bIAAqQI1.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russia announces strict inspection of Chinese cars.
According to Russian media reports, Russian Minister of Industry and Trade, Anton Alikhanov, announced at a State Council meeting that stricter certification and review will be implemented for cars from China. He even directly named three unnamed Chinese car brands as "having serious defects and not allowed on the road at all"
"Chinese automakers are actively infiltrating our market. In order to restore the balance, the Ministry of Industry and Trade is gradually adjusting the recycling fees, but this is not enough. More stringent certification work is needed, especially in checking the compliance of cars."
"The Ministry of Industry and Trade has conducted a proper analysis of the trucks and found that the trucks of three Chinese brands have serious defects. These cars are not allowed on the road at all," Anton Alikhanov said at the meeting.
According to Taiwan media Central News Agency, by the end of 2024, the share of Chinese brands in the Russian new car market has stabilized at 68%. According to Russian car market analysis agency Autos...
fullContent:
俄罗斯宣布严查中国汽车。
 据俄媒报道，俄罗斯工业和贸易部长，安东·阿利哈诺夫在国务院会议上宣布，将对来自中国的汽车实施更严格的认证和审查。甚至直接点名三个未具名的中国汽车品牌“存在严重缺陷，根本不允许上路”
 “中国汽车制造商正在积极渗透我们的市场，为了恢复平衡，工贸部正在逐步调整回收费，但这还不够，需要更严格的认证工作，尤其是在检查汽车合规性方面“ 
 “工贸部已经对卡车进行了适当分析，发现三个中国品牌的卡车存在严重缺陷，这些汽车根本不允许上路”安东·阿利哈诺夫在会议上说。
 台媒中央社报道，截至2024年底，中国品牌在俄罗斯新车市场的占有率已稳定在68%。 据俄罗斯车市分析机构Autostat统计，俄罗斯新车销量前10名当中，有7个品牌来自中国。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contribution from a student of Huairen No. 1 Middle School, Shanxi Province
I am a student of Huairen No. 1 Middle School, Shanxi Province. Located in Huairen City, Shuozhou City, Shanxi Province, Huairen No. 1 Middle School is like a solid fortress with strict barriers. Its strict military management model has become a typical epitome of the education system in northern Shanxi. For this reason, it is privately called "KK Park of northern Shanxi people" by our students...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Media person Lao Xu: I have an uncle who is retired from the system and is called the chairman. He has a monthly pension of 11,000 yuan, 132,000 yuan a year, while my parents' pension is only 20,000 yuan in ten years. The pension my parents received throughout their lives is not as much as my uncle's annual pension.
Are they the only ones who are qualified to take care of themselves and enjoy a stable old age, while my parents are not qualified to take care of themselves and enjoy a stable and comfortable old age? https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWCpdibAAA-KIl.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Henan Provincial People's Congress Representative Yang Shujuan said: Such a small loofah can be sold for more than ten US dollars in the overseas market, and the e-commerce sales of loofah will reach 37 million yuan in 2024.
However, the official has turned on the "banned comment mode" and prohibited netizens from discussing in this video. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWE7YAawAAY9yv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, a landslide occurred in Yunlian County, Yibin, Sichuan, causing 1 death, 28 missing, and 2 injured. A blogger wrote an article in which villagers questioned whether the cause of the collapse was due to nearby mining. It was subsequently deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWJZgtbcAApHw8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 9, the National Medical Insurance Drug Administration responded: "Narcotics don't make you sleep, laxatives don't make you laxative," and other statements are mostly from others' retelling and subjective feelings. This has aroused doubts and dissatisfaction among netizens.
Netizens said: Looking at the response from the National Medical Insurance Administration, it can be summed up in two sentences: There is no problem with the drugs purchased collectively, and the previous complaints of doctors are hearsay and cannot be relied upon.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWQIjNa0AA0qtW.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 6, Lu'an, Anhui. A man took a photo of a traffic policeman checking for drunk driving on the roadside and posted it to his Moments with the caption: "Be careful of the wolfhound team at the entrance of Yunhe Bay." He was summoned by the police and wrote a handwritten apology letter. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWSvBba4AA9dFi.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Xuancheng, Anhui. Secretary of the Jingde County Party Committee: You all think that civil servants are very stable, right? If you get your children into the civil service industry, it seems that they will have a stable job. But I don’t agree with this statement. The growth of cadres is a very difficult process. They must be tempered in the front line to be qualified. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888583193307365376/pu/img/j4X_T91pPd_Q0oO2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, a landslide occurred in Yunlian County, Sichuan Province. Currently, 28 people are missing. A father said that except for him who happened to go out and escaped the disaster, all four generations of his family were buried in the soil, including his one-year-old daughter. The father said: I wish I was the one buried. "My baby is still so young. How painful it would be if such a hard stone hit you." A blogger forwarded the father's post, which was later deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWcpaTaoAAM1BX.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 8 (Release) At 3 a.m. in Shanghai, many migrant workers who were looking for work gathered early. They had no education and most of them came from rural areas.
The workers said that they came here because they could not eat. Many of them did not find work for a week. Some workers also reported that they were owed 50,000 yuan in wages after working hard for a year.
A van drove up, and all the workers rushed in. Those who were not selected stood on the roadside in a daze, while the selected workers sat in the van and drove towards their "way to make a living"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, a man posted a video to protest the 12-hour work system in a factory in Jiangsu. Afterwards, the video and profile picture were deleted by the platform and the account was banned. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888603953899950082/pu/img/tl8iINs14CK7ag8z.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The number of marriage registrations nationwide will drop again in 2024.
Ministry of Civil Affairs: The number of marriage registrations nationwide in 2024 will be 6.106 million, down about 20.5% from 2023, and the number of divorce registrations will be 2.621 million, up about 1.1% from 2023 https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWuzCMbwAAw-pA.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 8 (Release) A man has been reporting on social media platforms for several days that a chemical factory in Dangji Town, Chengwu County, Shandong Province, illegally discharged chemical wastewater. Currently, all the videos posted by the man have disappeared, and his account homepage reads: "If I don't post a video one day, it means I have been victimized. As an ordinary citizen, I don't believe that they can cover up everything." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjWyqVwbgAEtpQk.jpg

content:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The number of marriage registrations nationwide will drop again in 2024. Ministry of Civil Affairs: The number of marriage registrations nationwide in 2024 will be 6.106 million, a decrease of about 20.5% from 2023, and the number of divorce registrations will be 2.621 million, an increase of about 1.1% from 2023

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger named "Boring Do Jun" with nearly 400,000 followers on Bilibili claims to be an assistant professor at a Japanese research institute. He usually deals with consulting services for studying in Japan. Recently, he said in a live broadcast: People like us just want to go to Japan, just lie down, don't make any contribution, just take advantage of them, pick up a Japanese girl, shoot videos together every day, and then there will be a group of people in the comment section saying that you are patriotic.
